name: GST Michigan Works!
address: Multiple locations across Michigan (specific address varies by service center)
description: Offers free career coaching sessions, resume assistance, job search strategies, and connection to local employment opportunities
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Career coaching in Michigan consultation

name: The Women's Center of Southeastern Michigan
address: 313 S. Liberty St., Ann Arbor, MI 48104 (Note: Career Coaching program may have a waitlist.)
description: Provides career coaching services, including resume drafting, job search strategies, interview skills, and negotiation advice, with a focus on challenges women may face
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Career coaching in Michigan consultation

name: SEMCA Michigan Works!
address: 25363 Eureka Rd., Taylor, MI 48180 (and other locations in Monroe and Wayne Counties)
description: Offers free career coaching, resume assistance, job fairs, and support for training and work-related items for residents of Monroe and Wayne Counties
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Career coaching in Michigan consultation

name: Michigan Society of Professional Engineers (Career Coaching)
description: Features several career coaches with various specializations, including Certified Professional Career Coaches and Resume Writers. Services are offered by individual coaches and prices vary
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Career coaching in Michigan consultation

name: Synko Associates, LLC
address: 3025 Boardwalk St, Suite 120, Ann Arbor, Michigan 48108
description: Offers career counseling and coaching for job-hunters, career-changers, students, and recent graduates, with a focus on aligning work with life fulfillment
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Career coaching in Michigan consultation

name: Alumni Association of the University of Michigan (Career Program)
address: Not a physical location for coaching, services are provided by partnered experts
description: Partners with career experts to offer coaching on resume review, interviewing skills, career changes, work-life balance, and leadership. Services are discounted for U-M alumni
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Career coaching in Michigan consultation

name: Michigan Ross Alumni Career Coaches
address: Services are virtual; contact via email
description: Offers complimentary career advising for Michigan Ross alumni, with a dedicated coach and additional alumni coaches available for paid engagements. Services include self-assessment, resume review, mock interviews, and career strategy
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Career coaching in Michigan consultation

name: Career Savvy Coaching
description: Focuses on helping individuals make career and life transitions
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Career coaching in Michigan consultation

name: University of Michigan Careers (Career Development Resources)
address: University Human Resources, 3005 Wolverine Tower, 3003 South State Street, Ann Arbor, MI 48109
description: Offers resources for career self-assessment, university resources, job search tools, and career planning information for University of Michigan staff and faculty
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Career coaching in Michigan consultation

name: Michigan Career Development Association (MichCDA)
address: Not a direct service provider, but an association offering resources
description: Provides a comprehensive list of resources for career development, including career exploration tools, employment information, and professional development opportunities. They also promote National Career Development Month
